TopicTitle: My first attempt at a planet texture revamp!

Articles.Content:
Planet Test Photo

I'm working on a new method for planet creation. It has some things I still need to work out, but I put this together today and I thought it looked really good for a first try! This is Ike BTW.  I might try to do a whole stock solar system revamp if I can figure out a few things.

Edited October 7, 2023 by rheaunderstars
Link was broken
That's better than what I can do on my first try. Please release it maybe?

On 10/7/2023 at 3:22 PM, rheaunderstars said:

Planet Test Photo

I'm working on a new method for planet creation. It has some things I still need to work out, but I put this together today and I thought it looked really good for a first try! This is Ike BTW.  I might try to do a whole stock solar system revamp if I can figure out a few things.

Pretty good! Like the details, although it kinda makes ike feel like a pebble (non-gravitationally rounded object) rather than a large moon. Might wanna publish the mod onto space dock!
